esema sanshodhana idiripath kala haki aakruthiya sthawara niyoga 38 yatathe dakwa thibena athara, idiripathwa athi sama sanshodhanayakma adala wana bawata, aandu krama wyawasthawe 77 wani waganthiya prakarawa nithipathiwaraya wisin parikshawata lakkala yuthu bawa, sthawara niyoga 3 darana anuwaganthiya yatathe kiyaweyi.

janadhipathithuma me thaththwaya hondin handunagena thamayi maththala dewani jathyanthara guwan thotupala idikirim aarambha kale.hambanthota magampura pradeshaye idikarana me guwan thotupala sandaha amerikanu dolar miliyana 209 k waya kerenawa.me wanawita guwan pathaye gal athurana katayuthu sidu keremin pawathinawa.

siyaluma parlimenthu manthri warun hata, sahallu gini awi (riwolwara ho pisthola) labadena bawath, danatamath ewani gini awi labagath manthri warunta, polis wishesha karya balakaya wisin, gini awi puhunuwa labadima aarambha kara athi bawath, (eka manthri kenekuta, wedi thabime puhunuwedi, thama pistholaya harihati grahanaya karagannata nohakiwima nisa, hathara athata wedi wadinnata gos, wishesha karya balakaye puhunu upadeshakayin wisin, maha anathurak yantham walakwa gath bawath, madhya wala palawuna)
